contexts.context: ...Howard began his career crafting stories that challenged society's <mark>conventional</mark> boundaries, and was right away met with praise...
...in 1989, Smith unequivocally resisted and upturned accepted <mark>conventions</mark>, whether artistic, moral or legal. Irreverent...
